simacogo.Player

    • Uses of Player in simacogo

      Subclasses of Player in simacogo 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComputerPlayer
      A class for a Computer Player.
      class  HumanPlayer
      An extension of the Game class that has methods to get user input and print out the Game board, scores, and game winner.

      static double Value.evaluate(Player player, State state)
      Evaluates a Player's score for the minimax algorithm (scorePlayer - scoreOpponent).

      Recursive implementation of the minimax algorithm.

      Calculates the current score of a Player in a specific State.
